name: defra-swagger-node-runner
description: A fork of swagger-node-runner <https://github.com/theganyo/swagger-node-runner> compatible with hapi.js 17
author: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs <https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-environment-food-rural-affairs>.

scripts.test: node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -u exports -R spec test test/lib test/fittings
scripts.coverage: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test test/lib test/fittings
scripts.coveralls: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test test/lib test/fittings && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js --verbose
